body: Students of the panther throw caution to the wind as they weave recklessly among their foes. Those who master the style turn their unrivaled mobility into a weapon, striking their enemies with a series of swift retaliatory strikes.Feat Path: Panther Style, Panther Claws, Panther Parry.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Feats/Types of Feats/Style Feats/Panther Style
name: Panther Style
